text: Nuko Musa atoranya abagabo mirongo irindwi (b’intungane) mu bantu be (ajyana na bo ku musozi wa Sinayi) ku bw’isezerano ryacu (kugira ngo bicuze icyaha cyakozwe na bene wabo). Maze ubwo bari bafashwe n’umutingito, (Musa) aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Iyo uza kubishaka bo nanjye wari kutworeka mbere y’aha; ese uratworeka kubera ibyaha byakozwe n’abadasobanukiwe muri twe? Ibi byabaye nta kindi byari cyo uretse kuba ikigeragezo cyawe, ukoresha urekera mu buyobe uwo ushaka ukanakiyoboresha uwo ushaka. Ni wowe Murinzi wacu, bityo tubabarire unatugirire impuhwe, kuko ari Wowe uhebuje mu kubabarira.”
